channel.title: talks on PR
channel.description: Recent content in talks on PR

item.title: Book recommendation : Creativity Inc by Ed Catmull
item.description: It is no surprise that you know about Pixar if you are even remotely knew Steve Jobs and his history. And you definitely heard about Pixar’s movies Toy story, Finding Nemo, Wall-E, Up & more.

item.title: WWDC'13 - Hidden Gems in Cocoa and Cocoa Touch
item.description: If you did not have enough time to go through the 50G contents from WWDC'13, I highly recommend you to watch the session 228, aptly named “Hidden Gems in Cocoa and Cocoa Touch”.

item.title: Randy Pausch Last Lecture: Achieving Your Childhood Dreams
item.description: Content requires Javascript to be enabled. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ji5_MqicxSo Youtube - Randy Pausch Last Lecture | Achieving Your Childhood Dreams

item.title: Recommended Git workflow
item.description: I recently started using Git as my revision control tool. Impressed by the use of branching and merging, I create and merge a lot of branches.

item.title: Shane Warne - The Leader
item.description: Color me surprised, I was amazed by his replies. Here is my favourite one Harsha Bhogle: What you strive to do as a leader?
